me-1.question: Who are you? (The real story)
me-1.answer: [Your answer here - 1-2 paragraphs about who you are, your background, what drives you]

me-2.question: What makes you tick?
me-2.answer: [Your answer here - what motivates you, what gets you excited, your core values]

me-3.question: What are your passions?
me-3.answer: [Your answer here - your interests, hobbies, things you're passionate about]

me-4.question: How did you get started in tech?
me-4.answer: [Your answer here - your journey into technology, what sparked your interest]

me-5.question: Where do you see yourself in 5 years?
me-5.answer: [Your answer here - your career goals, aspirations, vision for the future]

me-6.question: What's your origin story?
me-6.answer: [Your answer here - your background, how you got to where you are today]

me-easter.question: What's something nobody asks but should?
me-easter.answer: [Your answer here - something interesting about you that people don't usually ask]

pro-1.question: Can I see your resume?
pro-1.answer: [Your answer here - mention your experience widget or provide a brief summary of your professional background]

pro-2.question: Why should I hire you?
pro-2.answer: [Your answer here - your unique value proposition, key strengths, what sets you apart]

pro-3.question: What makes you a valuable team member?
pro-3.answer: [Your answer here - your collaboration skills, contributions, team-oriented qualities]

pro-4.question: Where are you working now?
pro-4.answer: [Your answer here - your current positions, companies, roles]

pro-5.question: What's your educational background?
pro-5.answer: [Your answer here - your education, degrees, relevant coursework]

pro-6.question: Tell me about your work philosophy
pro-6.answer: [Your answer here - your approach to work, principles, methodology]

pro-easter.question: What's your biggest professional failure?
pro-easter.answer: [Your answer here - a failure you learned from, growth experience]

proj-1.question: What projects are you most proud of?
proj-1.answer: [Your answer here - highlight 2-3 key projects, why you're proud of them, impact]

proj-2.question: Show me something impressive
proj-2.answer: [Your answer here - your most impressive project, what makes it stand out]

proj-3.question: Tell me about your AI/ML projects
proj-3.answer: [Your answer here - your AI/ML work, specific projects, technologies used]

proj-4.question: What's your biggest technical challenge?
proj-4.answer: [Your answer here - a challenging project or problem you solved, what you learned]

proj-5.question: Which project taught you the most?
proj-5.answer: [Your answer here - a project that was a learning experience, key takeaways]

proj-6.question: What are you building right now?
proj-6.answer: [Your answer here - current projects, work in progress, what you're developing]

proj-easter.question: What project idea keeps you up at night?
proj-easter.answer: [Your answer here - an exciting project idea you're passionate about]

skill-1.question: What are your skills?
skill-1.answer: [Your answer here - overview of your technical skills, areas of expertise]

skill-2.question: What's your tech stack?
skill-2.answer: [Your answer here - your preferred technologies, tools, frameworks you use]

skill-3.question: What technologies do you work with?
skill-3.answer: [Your answer here - list of technologies, languages, tools you're proficient in]

skill-4.question: What's your favorite programming language?
skill-4.answer: [Your answer here - your favorite language and why]

skill-5.question: What are you learning right now?
skill-5.answer: [Your answer here - current learning goals, new technologies you're exploring]

skill-6.question: Frontend or backend?
skill-6.answer: [Your answer here - your preference, full-stack experience, what you enjoy]

skill-easter.question: What skill do you secretly want to learn?
skill-easter.answer: [Your answer here - a skill you're curious about or want to explore]

fun-2.question: What's the craziest thing you've ever done?
fun-2.answer: [Your answer here - an adventurous or interesting experience]

fun-3.question: Tell me something fun about you
fun-3.answer: [Your answer here - something interesting, fun fact, quirky detail]

fun-4.question: What are your hobbies?
fun-4.answer: [Your answer here - your hobbies, interests outside of work]

fun-5.question: Got any adventure stories?
fun-5.answer: [Your answer here - an adventure or interesting story from your life]

fun-6.question: Mac or PC?
fun-6.answer: [Your answer here - your preference and why]

fun-7.question: Coffee or tea?
fun-7.answer: [Your answer here - your preference, any interesting details]

fun-easter.question: What's your most embarrassing tech moment?
fun-easter.answer: [Your answer here - a funny or embarrassing tech-related story]

contact-1.question: How can I reach you?
contact-1.answer: [Your answer here - email, LinkedIn, GitHub, preferred contact method]

contact-2.question: Let's work together!
contact-2.answer: [Your answer here - your openness to collaboration, types of projects you're interested in]

contact-3.question: What kind of project would make you say 'yes' immediately?
contact-3.answer: [Your answer here - types of projects that excite you, what you're looking for]

contact-4.question: Where are you located?
contact-4.answer: [Your answer here - your location, remote work availability]

contact-5.question: Are you open to opportunities?
contact-5.answer: [Your answer here - your availability, types of opportunities you're interested in]

contact-6.question: What's your ideal next role?
contact-6.answer: [Your answer here - what you're looking for in your next position, career goals]

contact-easter.question: What would make you relocate?
contact-easter.answer: [Your answer here - conditions under which you'd consider relocating]

surprise-me.question: Surprise me!
surprise-me.answer: [Your answer here - a varied, interesting response that could be about anything - a fun fact, recent achievement, interesting project, or something unexpected about you]

tell-me-a-secret.question: Tell me a secret
tell-me-a-secret.answer: [Your answer here - something interesting, surprising, or fun that people might not know about you]
